table.name: Baldur's Gate Encounters
table.caption: Baldur's Gate Encounters
rows: A {@creature Mage Apprentice|XMM} and their {@creature Shield Guardian|XMM} seek an answer to a difficult magical puzzle.
{@dice 2d4} {@creature Guard|XMM|Guards} interrogate passersby.
A popular {@creature Gladiator|XMM} seeks challengers to publicly demonstrate the gladiator's might.
An {@creature Assassin|XMM} asks the characters pointed questions about a nearby establishment.
A {@creature Noble|XMM} suggests the characters secure an invitation to a party at Eomane House (see "{@book Blood Night|FRAiF|6|Blood Night}" later in this chapter).
A {@creature Doppelganger|XMM} merchant is offloading stolen weapons at a suspiciously low price.
{@dice 2d4} {@creature Performer|XMM|Performers} hold an impromptu street show while their {@creature Spy|XMM} ally picks pockets.
{@dice 1d3} {@creature Priest Acolyte|XMM|Priest Acolytes} of Oghma peddle tickets to a lecture at the Unrolling Scroll.
An old sailor suggests that the Harborhands crew at the dock needs aid (see "{@book Tide of Teeth|FRAiF|6|Tide of Teeth}" later in this chapter).
A disguised {@creature Lamia|XMM} bookseller and its {@dice 2d4} {@creature Jackalwere|XMM} minions promise rare tomes that guarantee entry into Candlekeep.
{@dice 2d4} {@creature Pirate|XMM|Pirates} on shore leave start a fight.
{@dice 1d4} {@creature Druid|XMM|Druids} rail against recent public works that have devastated a local park.
Two {@creature Cultist Fanatic|XMM|Cultist Fanatics} devoted to Myrkul hide blanket-covered corpses in an empty shed.
A {@creature Tough Boss|XMM} and {@dice 1d4} {@creature Tough|XMM|Toughs} shake down a shopkeeper behind on protection payments.
{@dice 2d6} Flaming Fist members (one is a {@creature Warrior Veteran|XMM}, the others are {@creature Warrior Infantry|XMM}) berate citizens about a recent robbery.

A merchant ({@creature Noble|XMM}) specializing in {@item Mechanical Wonder|FRAiF|Mechanical Wonders} sends the characters to meet the clever clock-worker Flurn Eightspoke (see "{@book Clockwork Memories|FRAiF|6|Clockwork Memories}" later in this chapter).
A {@creature Swarm of Rats|XMM} surges from an alley where {@dice 1d6} {@creature Wererat|XMM|Wererats} wait to ambush wealthy travelers distracted by the swarm.
An {@creature Otyugh|XMM} lumbers from a sewer entrance, enraged at a recent civic initiative to sluice clean water through its home.
{@dice 2d4} {@creature Commoner|XMM|Commoners} share drinks in celebration of their crew's recent good fortune.
{@dice 1d4} {@creature Noble|XMM|Nobles} spill out of one of Cottle's carriages, unsure how they've suddenly arrived in such a disreputable part of town.
